com.sap.furcas.ide.projectwizard.util
Class ProjectInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.sap.furcas.ide.projectwizard.util.ProjectInfo

public class ProjectInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Saves all the information entered in the wizard. See the variables for detailed information.

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String className
          Stores the name of the first class that is used for the main template in the language.
private  java.lang.String fileExtension
          The languages file extension as entered on the LanguagePage.
private  boolean fromWorkspace
          Will be true if loading an existing metamodel from workspace OR if loading the metamodel from a freshly created metamodel project.
private  java.lang.String languageName
          The name of the language as entered on the LanguagePage.
private  boolean loadMetamodel
          Will be true if an existing metamodel will be loaded and false if a new Metamodel project will be created.
private  java.lang.String modelPath
          Is not directly entered by the user but gets assgigned on the LoadPage.
private  java.lang.String nsURI
          The nsURI of the metamodel as entered on the SelectionPage if new Metamodel project creation is chosen.
private  java.lang.String projectName
          The name of the language project as entered on the LanguagePage.

Field Detail

projectName

private java.lang.String projectName
The name of the language project as entered on the LanguagePage.

languageName

private java.lang.String languageName
The name of the language as entered on the LanguagePage.

fileExtension

private java.lang.String fileExtension
The languages file extension as entered on the LanguagePage.

nsURI

private java.lang.String nsURI
The nsURI of the metamodel as entered on the SelectionPage if new Metamodel project creation is chosen.

className

private java.lang.String className
Stores the name of the first class that is used for the main template in the language. When new Metamodel project creation is chosen it will be assigned on the SelectionPage. If not it will be assigned on the ClassChooserPage.

modelPath

private java.lang.String modelPath
Is not directly entered by the user but gets assgigned on the LoadPage. It stores the Path to a referenced metamodel if needed.

loadMetamodel

private boolean loadMetamodel
Will be true if an existing metamodel will be loaded and false if a new Metamodel project will be created.

fromWorkspace

private boolean fromWorkspace
Will be true if loading an existing metamodel from workspace OR if loading the metamodel from a freshly created metamodel project. Will be false if loading from registered packages.
